subject: p17770657
History: Reintubation, chest exploration for bleeding, evaluate interval change.
Findings: An ET tube is present, approximately 6 cm above the carina. An NG tube is present, tip extending beneath diaphragm off film. Left mediastinal drain and left-sided chest tubes are present. A right IJ central line tip overlies the mid SVC. No pneumothorax detected. The cardiomediastinal silhouette is prominen,t but unchanged. There is upper zone re-distribution, diffuse vascular blurring, interstitial and minimal alveolar edema, consistent with CHF. There is dense retrocardiac density, consistent with left lower lobe collapse and/or consolidation. Small joint effusions. Multiple mediastinal clips and right-sided vertical density noted.
